translations.Public link sharing is disabled by the a: اشتراک پیوندهای عمومی توسط مدیر غیرفعال شده است

translations.Wrong path, file/folder does not exist: Wrong path, file/folder does not exist
translations.Could not create share: امکان ایجاد اشتراک گذاری وجود ندارد
translations.App adding the ability to specify share: App adding the ability to specify share tokens
translations.App for Nextcloud that adds the ability:
App for Nextcloud that adds the ability to specify share tokens when creating new public links and change tokens of existing links.

## Features

Sharing sidebar is expanded by new section (Custom public link) that allows you to create public links with custom share tokens.
You can also customize share tokens of existing public links.

## Settings

By going to **Settings > Administration > Configurable Share Links** admins can set default labels for custom links and minimal token length.
Default label can be: none, same as token or custom (the same custom label for all custom links).
translations.Configure whether a default label should: Configure whether a default label should be set to custom links and what that label should be
translations.Keep this option off if you did not use: Keep this option off if you did not use versions lower than 1.2.0
translations.Delete shares of deleted files during to: Delete shares of deleted files during token checks (when creating/updating share)
translations.Entered length is not a number: Entered length is not a number
translations.Minimum length must be at least 1: Minimum length must be at least 1
translations.Error occurred while creating public lin: Error occurred while creating public link
translations.Error occurred while renaming public lin: Error occurred while renaming public link
